for the daemon I changed net.cpp     MAXCONNECTIONS for 16 to 300
and than in the komodo.conf    MAXCONNECTIONS= 40

Content: and if you want a *shitload* find the sleep right before it asks for more peers

Author: Alright#0419
Content: `Disclaimer: As Pieter Wuille pointed out, it can harm the network to run a modified client like this one. Please use this solution for research purposes only and not as a permanent solution.`

Author: Alright#0419
Content: but if you want a top node.....

Author: Alright#0419
Content: the problem it would create if every single notary does this is that peers are a limited resource

Author: Alright#0419
Content: there is only a finite number of peers most of which have maxconnections=8

Content: you basically want to position your node as a central relay node for blocks

Content: and if you do, you will have them first and get more notarizations

Author: Strob#3417
Content: Finally got that autosplit to work in cron!

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: what got it working?

Author: Strob#3417
Content: the grep is not working with cron. I was using that line cause at first I thought the jq was not working (line 57-58

Author: Strob#3417
Content: In fact it was the NN pubkey that we must input corectly for it to work. We must add 21 before and ac after (not AC) to get what is called a lock script pubkey

Author: Strob#3417
Content: the  jq seems to be compatible with cron

Author: Strob#3417
Content: I tried to make cron to print this line every 1 minute ```komodo-cli listunspent | grep .0001 | wc -l```

Author: Strob#3417
Content: it gives 0 instead of my utxo number which was 20.

Author: Strob#3417
Content: If I enter the command in the terminal it gives 20 but in cron it gives 0!

Author: Strob#3417
Content:
My peers are far better than before now: 
```css
-CHAIN-     -NOTR- -LASTN- -UTXO-    -BAL-   -BLOX- -LASTB- -CON- -SIZE-
KMD                     5m     20    2.840  1298213     15s    25   2.0M 
BEER            46      8m     13    2.962    80153     57s    26   860K       
PIZZA           31      5m     14    2.295    71992      2m    22   820K 
TXSCLCC         68     10m     14    2.986   182985     59s    24   604K @ 03:36
```

Author: Strob#3417
Content:
Look if we use AC like the decker comment says we get 0 while ac was giving me 18!! 
```css

~/Desktop$ komodo-cli listunspent | jq '[.[] | select (.generated==false and .amount==0.0001 and .spendable==true and (.scriptPubKey == "'2187jh763105a5771042d9jhjhjhjhjhjjhjh03e16acaf877877878787878uiuha7bAC'"))] | length'
0
~/Desktop$ komodo-cli listunspent | jq '[.[] | select (.generated==false and .amount==0.0001 and .spendable==true and (.scriptPubKey == "'2187jh763105a5771042d9jhjhjhjhjhjjhjh03e16acaf877877878787878uiuha7bac'"))] | length'
18
```
😥 took me a long time to find out!

Author: Strob#3417
Content:
```css
# all you need is to insert your pubkey here in lock script format: 21{YOUR_33_BYTES_HEX_PUBKEY}AC
```
